headline: Here’s how investors can play latest wave of corporate breakups
summary: Corporate breakups have been a key theme of 2025 so far. Vinson & Elkins' strategic mergers & acquisitions (M&A) head Sebastian Tiller sits down with Josh Lipton to discuss the trend. Read up on Yahoo Finance's coverage of the rising occurrence of corporate breakups.  To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

headline: Warner Bros (WBD) Climbs 55.8% on Paramount Skydance (PSKY) Bid Report
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks That Made Millionaires in Just a Week. Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc. (NASDAQ:WBD) is one of the best performers in last week’s trading. Warner Bros surged by 55.82 percent week-on-week as investors snapped up shares following reports that it was being targeted for acquisition by Paramount Skydance Corp. According to a […]

headline: Netflix’s ties to Paramount and Warner Bros.: How much do they matter?
summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein analysts said in a note Monday that Netflix’s reliance on licensed content from Paramount and Warner Bros. Discovery is limited, even if a potential merger between the two were to disrupt licensing arrangements.
